articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Netflix's Exploding Kittens mobile game launches at the end of May - The Verge
articles.description: Netflix’s Exploding Kittens — The Game will be available for free for Netflix subscribers on May 31st. The company also revealed that Moonlighter, Townsmen — A Kingdom Rebuilt, and Dragon Up are coming to the service.
articles.content:
Three other games will be available Tuesday
Play the new game beginning May 31st.
Image: Netflix
